title: They did it guys, RIOT did it :')
body:
half a month ago i recieved a wrong ban regarding selling of account. It ws looking as if my account was gone. I tried every day asking for a reply and then today, my ban has been lifted. 

> After further review, there does appear to be a mistake made on our end that flagged this account for suspicious activities. I am incredibly sorry for the mistake, and for the amount of time it took to clear up this issue. As a result, I have removed the suspension from the account, and have awarded this account 975 RP for any frustration we may have caused.

>Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns, and I will be happy to help. 

Thank you for this RIOT... im in tears ;')
